p: The stems, leaves, and flowers of Phlomis aucheri, which is endemic to Iran, and stems, leaves and roots of Teucrium polium, were collected from Salehabad area, Province of Ilam, west of Iran, both in July 2013, during the flowering stage. The leaves of Ajuga chamaecistus were collected from Mehran, Province of Ilam, in July 2013. Voucher specimens have been deposited at the Herbarium of the Reasearch Instituents of Forests and Rangelands (TARI), Tehran, Iran.
